title: Sans Serif - Balzac
content:
Looking for this font. Sorry for the small image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828213702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/balzac_3777.png)
author: P_P

comments.content: Judging by the /S, I'd say [DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828213702/http:/myfonts.us/td-3ojlx7) (or [DIN Engschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828213702/http:/myfonts.us/td-GImAXm)) with a grunge post-treatment.
